name: 8Ball

image.alt: Come with Reverse performing live at 8ball club Thessaloniki

body:
After their two gigs in Athens, and their latest, very successful gig in Thessaloniki in March, Come with Reverse are about to rock their hometown again, this time on the stage of 8ball club. Being a part of a “dark sounds festival”, together with “Split Image” from Athens and “We came From Waters” from Florina, they are about to perform for us the songs from their debut E.P. as well as a lot of brand new songs from their upcoming album. This is a must-see live show for Thessaloniki and we can expect only the best for the 23rd of March. Be there!

Entry: 8 € + beer
artists: Split image, We Came From Waters, Come with Reverse
